Label: G4_BlowRescue04
String:
Thanks for saving me!  That Ptooie's breath smelled
like fish! Ugh!

Label: G4_AfterBattle_Painky01
String:
They said the circus is just up
ahead!   Can we go, Mario?
PleaseÈ pleaseÈ please Èplease Èplease!

Label: G4_Bros_Appear01
String:
Glad you could make it today, folks!
The encore is about to begin!  Please put your hands together for
this exclusive encore performance by
the legendary Pentabros!

Label: G4_Bros_AfterBattle01
String:
This was just a sneak peek of the
face-melting spectacles on display
at the Emerald Circus!  Please check out the Emerald Circus
just up ahead, and follow us on
social media!

Label: G4_Dead_KNP03_2
String:
What's better: purple or orange?
I can't decide!

Label: G4_Dead_KNP01_1
String:
Where am I?!̠
This forest is creepy!
I mean, just listen to this music!

Label: G4_Swing_HEI01
String:
Mario...  It's me, remember? You listened to
my story that time on the Sunset
Express.  If it had to happen this way,
I'm glad it was you...

Label: G4_FindPoster_Painky02
String:
Huh?
Looks like there's a poster stuck to
that tree.

Label: G4_FindPoster_Painky03
String:
Mario!
It says there's a circus!
It says it's fun!
It wouldn't lie about that!

Label: G4_TrapezeRescue01
String:
The trapeze is really difficult
because you've got to pull off
sweet poses and moves in midair.  If I had just a little more time, I
could've been the greatest trapeze
artist of our generation!

Label: G4_Dead_KNP02_1
String:
Someone snuck up and drained me
while I was watching those high-wire
jugglers! I'm outta here!
